overview: Switzerland is a true paradise for multi-pitch climbing, as well as the country where Cedric  Lachat was born and raised. Through his unique sense of humor and unbridled enthusiasm,  experience the beauty and awe of five iconic peaks and mountain ranges: the Eiger,  Gastlosen, Wendenstöcke, Lauterbrunnen, and Rätikon. In addition to footage of hard  climbing (8a and up), the first ascensionists talk about the changes in gear and climbing over  time, from traditional mountaineering to modern sport climbing.
title: Swissway to Heaven
